definition.title: What are Kidney Stones?
definition.content: Kidney stones are hard deposits made of minerals and salts that form inside the kidneys. These stones can cause severe pain and discomfort, and sometimes need medical attention when they do not pass naturally.

treatment.title: Treatment Options
treatment.content: Treatment for kidney stones depends on the size and location of the stones. Smaller stones can be treated with pain relievers and increased water intake while larger stones may require medical intervention.

prevention.title: Prevention
listItems: Avoid excessive amounts of high-oxalate foods
